summary: This bill, the Innovative Feed Enhancement and Economic Development Act of 2025 (Innovative FEED Act), amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to regulate zootechnical animal food substances. It defines these substances and outlines regulations for their use, including labeling requirements and petition processes. The bill aims to ensure the safe and effective use of substances that affect animal digestive processes, reduce foodborne pathogens, or alter animal body structure/function within the gastrointestinal tract, excluding those used for disease treatment.
